text: Cookie dough is a type of dough. It can be used to make cookies. Cookie dough may also be used to make cookie dough ice cream. ==History== Cookie's history dates back to 7th century Persia. They were the first started using sugar for cakes and pastries. In earlier times, it was used as a test cake to check oven's temperature. == References == Category:Cookies Category:Doughs
title: Cookie dough
